long_description: The women's Vasque Mindbender shoes provide support, plenty of cushioning and excellent traction as you set out running trails. Breathable, abrasion-resistant synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers are lightweight and flexible for comfort; thermoplastic urethane overlays provide structure and support. Nylon linings absorb excess moisture and disperse it for fast drying; protective toe bumpers shield toes and uppers from abrasion. Padded tongues and collars add comfort and relieve pressure from lacing. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. Removable dual-density EVA footbeds add cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane shanks and nylon forefoot plates provide support and stability on rough terrain and protection from sharp objects underfoot. Molded dual-density EVA midsoles cushion the footstrike and assist in heel-to-midfoot transition. Blur trail-running outsoles utilize a slip-resistant rubber compound and feature aggressive, multidirectional lugs for superior traction.
short_description: The women's Vasque Mindbender shoes provide support, plenty of cushioning and excellent traction as you set out running trails.
